overview: Today the Boer is going to get fucked! Whether it's the potion or the African magic, the horrible white man remains lifeless on the floor and Luthando, the black farm boy, must flee. Where to? To Cape Town, naturally, the capital of gay sex! This is where tourists and locals fuck through the beds and over the sofas â€“ and the obligatory pool boy does what a pool boy must: he bends over!
title: Luthando: Cape Town Stories
